definitions.definition: To cause an increase in temperature of (an object or space); to cause to become hot (often with "up").

definitions.example: There's a pot of soup heating on the stove.

definitions.definition: To excite or make hot by action or emotion; to make feverish.
To excite ardour in; to rouse to action; to excite to excess; to inflame, as the passions.
A system that raises the temperature of a room or building. Compare heater.
The act of making something hot.
definitions.example: The crucible was subjected to several heatings.
